Texts.Eng: Thank you, my fellow Starfarer! This is exactly what I was looking for. Take this helmet and these tokens - you have earned them!

Would you help out a fellow Starfarer, friend? I'm in need of a ^orange;Sandspitter's Sack ^white;and a ^orange;Sandcrawler's Tooth ^white;for a little experiment of mine, but I am stuck here while my ship is being repaired... If you could ^green;hunt down a Sandspitter and a Sandcrawler on a desert planet^white;, I would be most grateful!
